name: MTLRenderPassAttachmentDescriptor
desc: A render target that serves as the output destination for pixels generated by a render pass.

items.name: var texture: MTLTexture?
items.desc: The texture object associated with this attachment.

items.name: var level: Int
items.desc: The mipmap level of the texture used for rendering to the attachment.

items.name: var slice: Int
items.desc: The slice of the texture used for rendering to the attachment.

items.name: var depthPlane: Int
items.desc: The depth plane of the texture used for rendering to the attachment.

items.name: var loadAction: MTLLoadAction
items.desc: The action performed by this attachment at the start of a rendering pass for a render command encoder.

items.name: var storeAction: MTLStoreAction
items.desc: The action performed by this attachment at the end of a rendering pass for a render command encoder.

items.name: var storeActionOptions: MTLStoreActionOptions
items.desc: The options that modify the store action performed by this attachment.

items.name: enum MTLLoadAction
items.desc: Types of actions performed for an attachment at the start of a rendering pass.

items.name: enum MTLStoreAction
items.desc: Types of actions performed for an attachment at the end of a rendering pass.

items.name: struct MTLStoreActionOptions
items.desc: Options that modify a store action.

items.name: var resolveTexture: MTLTexture?
items.desc: The destination texture used when resolving multisampled texture data into single sample values.

items.name: var resolveLevel: Int
items.desc: The mipmap level of the texture used for the multisample resolve action.

items.name: var resolveSlice: Int
items.desc: The slice of the texture used for the multisample resolve action.

items.name: var resolveDepthPlane: Int
items.desc: The depth plane of the texture used for the multisample resolve action.
